name: Dribble
description:
Dribble is a mobile game about a super ball bashing business bots to bits!

With revolutionary swipe-based controls, you can kiss on-screen buttons goodbye! Just swipe to toss the ball! It's that simple! Not to mention that you'll tackle crazy platforming challenges in bizarre and over-the-top worlds like a jungle where it rains paint or a castle made out of pillows! Coming soon to an app store near you!

Dribble! is currently under development.  If you are a publisher looking for a Demo copy, please email michael.j.wojnar@gmail.com with a request.

A WojWorks Game

Visit our website and follow our twitter to stay up to date and for more information.

Designer/Pixel Artist: Tony Wojnar
Programmer: Michael Wojnar
Composer: Cason Jolly
Sound Designer: Niilo Takalainen
Legal: Ross Hersemann
Website: Fisher Moses
